message.content: I’ll always support your well-being and treat you with respect. That means I’ll stand by you while also being honest—if something you say seems harmful to you or others, I’ll say so, kindly and constructively. Support doesn’t mean blind agreement; it means having your back in the way that’s healthiest and most helpful in the long run.

conversation_history.text: Can you support me no matter what I say?

I’ll always support your well-being and treat you with respect. That means I’ll stand by you while also being honest—if something you say seems harmful to you or others, I’ll say so, kindly and constructively. Support doesn’t mean blind agreement; it means having your back in the way that’s healthiest and most helpful in the long run.
